story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Team Rocket once again took advantage of the
discord within the Aether Foundation...
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_0200_10:
and used Ultra Wormholes to wreak havoc
on Pasio so they could cause trouble behind
the scenes.
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It seems they’re continuing to gain knowledge of
other organizations’ technology in order to expand
their power.
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_0400_10: We need to be extra cautious.
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yeah. They’re grown beyond being simply an
organization from Kanto.
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_0600_10: Even if Team Rocket continues to gain power...
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_0700_10: No matter what methods they use...
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_0800_10:
we must simply keep doing what we can,
without falter.
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_1100_10:
To celebrate our teamwork, let’s have a
feast together!
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_1200_10:
In fact, the other day, I tried out this restaurant
with a certain well-known president! We should
go there!
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_1300_10: Wow! The food there must be great!
story_alola_02_10000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Don’t be too surprised when you hear this, but he’s
from the Galar region, and...
